definitions.text: small wild or domesticated web-footed broad-billed swimming bird usually having a depressed body and short legs
(cricket) a score of nothing by a batsman
flesh of a duck (domestic or wild)
a heavy cotton fabric of plain weave; used for clothing and tents
to move (the head or body) quickly downwards or away
examples: Before he could duck, another stone struck him

definitions.text: avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
examples: They tend to evade their responsibilities
